column1: !  List here the radical gas phase species used in MISTRA
!  Blank lines or lines starting with an exclamation mark are ignored
! The first column contains the index of the radical gas used in MISTRA.
!    The indexes need to be sorted with increasing numbers
!    It is possible to comment out some lines and keep the following indexes unchanged
!    The max index actually used should be identical to 'j5_max' specified in 'gas_species.dat'
!    The total number of gases actually used (i.e. not commented in the list) will be automatically exported as 'j1_used'
! The second column displays the name of the gas as written in the KPP mechanism.
!    A maximum of 12 characters is currently allowed, as is in KPP-2.2.3 (Fortran77 output)
! The third column holds the molecular mass of the gas ( in kg.mol-1 )
! The fourth and fifth columns holds the initial mixing ratios at ground and top levels in nmol mol-1 (ppb)
